title: Font Conference joke on YouTube
content:
Am I the last to see this?

[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i3k5oY9AHHM](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018065339/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=i3k5oY9AHHM "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i3k5oY9AHHM")
author: John Nolan

comments.content:
Oh man. Yes, you sure are.

[http://www.typophile.com/node/47937](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018065339/http:/www.typophile.com/node/47937 "http://www.typophile.com/node/47937")
Didn’t Zara already state that nobody is allowed to post about that video anymore?
Oops! I was on holiday at a cottage that week and missed it first time round.
You are so lucky she is out of town.
